subject: Self Care
title: Lack of Control
description: A quick win: understand Lack of Control.

hook.text: He had no say in his schedule, his tasks, or his goals. He was working hard but steering nothing. That broke him.

buildup.text: Autonomy is a core human need. When people can't influence their work conditions, helplessness follows quickly.

discovery.text: The demand-control model shows that high demands with low control is the most toxic combination for burnout.

twist.text: Even small increases in autonomy â€” choosing your schedule or your methods â€” significantly reduce burnout risk.

climax.text: If you can't change the demands, negotiate for more control over how and when you meet them. Control is the buffer.

punchline.text: Burnout thrives where control is missing. Reclaim what you can.

quiz.question: What does the demand-control model show about burnout?
options: High demands with low control is the most toxic combination
Control has no effect on burnout
